item.Q:
Write the character:

item.A:
益 (strokes unavailable)
yì

item.Q:
Write the character:
pen; pencil; writing brush; to write or compose; the strokes of Chinese characters; measure word for sums of money, deals
item.A:
traditional: 筆
bǐ
铅笔 (鉛筆) qiānbǐ (lead) pencil

item.Q:
Write the character:
handsome; graceful; smart; commander in chief
item.A:
帅 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 帥
shuài
挂帅 (掛帥) guàshuài to take command; to assume leadership (of large army); dominate

item.Q:

to catch; to obtain; to capture
item.A:
traditional: 獲
huò
获得 (獲得) huòdé to obtain; to receive; to get

item.Q:

share; portion; section; part; thigh; (classifier for smells or electric current); whiff
item.A:
股 (strokes unavailable)
gǔ
股东 (股東) gǔdōng stockholder

item.Q:
Write the character:

item.A:
迫 (strokes unavailable)
pò
压迫 (壓迫) yāpò oppress; oppression

item.Q:
Write the character:
to break wind; to fart
item.A:
屁 (strokes unavailable)
pì
屁股 pìgu buttocks; bottom; arse; end; butt

item.Q:

fresh
item.A:
鲜 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 鮮
xiān
朝鲜 (朝鮮) cháoxiān North Korea

(a measure word); second
item.A:
miǎo
毫秒 háomiǎo millisecond, ms
